title: Historical Controversies and Revisionism - Collection 7
description:
Historical Controversies and Revisionism - Collection 7:

We have 26 titles here:

-  Appleby et al - Telling the Truth about History (1994)

-  Barash - Martin Heidegger and the Problem of Historical Meaning, 2e (2003)

-  Bartov - Germany's War and the Holocaust; Disputed Histories (2003)

-  Brundage - Going to the Sources; a Guide to Historical Research and Writing, 5e (2013)

-  Cannadine (Ed.) - What is History Now (2002)

-  Collingwood - The Idea of History (1993)

-  Cullen - Essaying the Past; How to Read, Write, and Think about History, 2e (2013)

-  Docherty & Macgregor - Hidden History; the Secret Origins of the First World War (2013)

-  Durant - The Lessons of History (1968)

-  Gorman - Historical Judgement; the Limits of Historiographical Choice (2007)

-  Hamilton - Historicism (1996)

-  Hoffman et al (Eds.) - Major Problems in American History, Vol. I - To 1877, 3e (2012)

-  Hoffman et al (Eds.) - Major Problems in American History, Vol. II - Since 1865, 3e (2012)

-  Hughes-Warrington - Revisionist Histories (2013)

-  King - The Bad War; the Truth Never Taught About World War 2 (2015)

-  Kollerstrom - Breaking the Spell; the Holocaust, Myth & Reality (2014)

-  Martel (Ed.) - The Origins of the Second World War Reconsidered, 2e (1999)

-  Oakeshott - What is History, and Other Essays (2004)

-  Olds - Forging the Past; Invented Histories in Counter-Reformation Spain (2015)

-  Oliver - Surviving the French Revolution; a Bridge Across Time (2013)

-  Raab - The Crisis from Within; Historians, Theory, and the Humanities (2015)

-  Raaflaub (Ed.) - Thinking, Recording, and Writing History in the Ancient World (2014)

-  Sertima - They Came Before Columbus; the African Presence in Ancient America (1976)

-  Sherry - Empire and Revolution; a Socialist History of the First World War (2014)

-  Showalter (Ed.) - History in Dispute, Vol. 4; World War II, 1939-1943 (2000)

-  Showalter (Ed.) - History in Dispute, Vol. 5; World War II, 1943-1945 (2000)
